import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { Container } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { login } from '../actions/userActions' import PageBannerIcon from '../components/PageBanner/PageBannerIcon' import Message from '../components/Message' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function LoginScreen(location, history) { const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const dispatch = useDispatch() const redirect = location.search ? location.search.split('=')[1] : '/' const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.userLogin) const {error, loading, userInfo} = userLogin useEffect(()=> { if (userInfo) { } }, [history, userInfo, redirect]) const submitHandler = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() dispatch(login(email, password)) } return (
